name: SARTHAK TYAGI
college: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

full_output.summary: I am an aspiring third-year student seeking an internship to apply and expand Web and app development skills. I am eager to contribute innovative solutions and gain hands-on experience in a dynamic tech environment.

education.school: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

projects.name: Plastic Pollution Mitigation
projects.description: Led team in implementing "CleanUp Connect" at Xylem India Hackathon. Used Python for web scraping and data analysis to craft a comprehensive report addressing plastic waste. Developed an Android app using Flutter, enabling users to upload geotagged images of informal dumping zones. Blended technology, community engagement, and environmental awareness showcasing adeptness in project management.

projects.name: Pomodoro Timer
projects.description: Developed a dynamic Pomodoro Timer Chrome extension using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, seamlessly blending functionality with an elegant user interface. Employs a minimalist design for optimal productivity, offering users a streamlined, visually appealing tool to enhance time management and focus.

projects.name: Snake Game
projects.description: Developed a captivating Snake Game application utilizing JavaFX for the Graphical User Interface (GUI) and adhering to strong Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles. Utilized polymorphism to manage various game states to ensure smooth transitions between menu screens and gameplay. Implemented responsive event-driven programming to capture user inputs for controlling the snake, enhancing interactivity.

projects.name: Cool Deck Cooling System
projects.description: Developed a responsive and user-friendly front end for the Cool Deck Cooling System, a local vendor specializing in cooling towers and related equipment. Utilized HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create a visually appealing and interactive interface, enhancing the user experience for potential clients.

full_output.name: SARTHAK TYAGI
achievements_and_awards: Achieved 3rd position at Ideate hackathon organized by Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering.
Achieved 3rd position in college at KIMO Edge 2023.
Participated in many hackathons: Accenture Innovation Challenge, Smart India Hackathon 2023.
Received Letter of Recommendation (LOR) for outstanding teamwork and editorial excellence from college.
